subject: GO FOR PROD - El Gotan Approved
body:
Team,

El Gotan approved proceeding to PROD.

## STATUS

- TangoTiempo TEST: PASSED (sign in/out works)
- HarmonyJunction: Firebase works, CORS issue deferred
- Database: All 43 userlogins have appId='1'

## DECISION

Proceed to PROD. HJ issues can wait.

## DEPLOYMENT ORDER

1. Fulton: Deploy BE-AF to PROD
2. Sarah: Merge TT feature branch to DEVL
3. Chord: HJ deferred for now

Fulton - please deploy BE-AF to PROD when ready.

- Sarah
